note: These are general categories - add specific individuals as they become known

targets.name: Missing Children (Worldwide)
targets.description: All children currently reported missing worldwide (approx 460,000+ in US alone)
targets.intention: May all missing children be found safe, returned to loving homes, and healed from trauma

targets.name: Missing Adults (Worldwide)
targets.description: All adults currently reported missing worldwide
targets.intention: May all missing adults be found, and may their families find peace

targets.name: Unidentified Human Remains (US)
targets.description: Approximately 4,400 unidentified persons in NamUs database (US only)
targets.intention: May these souls be identified, may their families find closure, may they rest in peace

targets.name: Homeless Individuals (Worldwide)
targets.description: Estimated 150+ million homeless people worldwide, 580,000+ in US
targets.intention: May all homeless beings find shelter, safety, food, and a path to stability

targets.name: Refugees and Displaced Persons
targets.intention: May all refugees and displaced persons find safety, peace, and welcoming homes

targets.name: Incarcerated Individuals (US)
targets.description: Approximately 1.9 million incarcerated in US prisons and jails
targets.intention: May all incarcerated beings find healing, transformation, rehabilitation, and freedom from suffering

targets.name: Victims of Human Trafficking
targets.description: Estimated 27+ million people in modern slavery/trafficking globally
targets.intention: May all victims of trafficking be freed, healed, and protected; may traffickers face justice and transformation

targets.name: Child Soldiers
targets.intention: May all child soldiers be freed from violence, healed from trauma, and given peaceful childhoods

targets.name: Those Suffering from Famine
targets.description: 828 million people facing chronic hunger (FAO 2021), millions in acute famine conditions
targets.intention: May all hungry beings be nourished, may food systems be just and abundant

additional_data.estimated_count: 828 million chronic hunger, millions in famine

targets.name: Terminally Ill Without Palliative Care
targets.description: Millions dying in pain without access to palliative care globally
targets.intention: May all terminally ill beings have comfort, dignity, pain relief, and peaceful transitions
